attributes.review: So I wanted to download this app to get into politics Bc I’m a very historic person and I love politics😍🥰 but anyways, when I downloaded it, my phone was glitching so much that water fell on it through the screen and it is now broken. Please fix my phone, this is your fault. Mr president orange was really being annoying and his voice sounding like pac man 👨 but that’s besides the point, my phone is now broken and it is being really annoying. Please contact the president to give me 100,000,000 dollars. This costed me 200,000,000 dollars but I’ll lower it for u guys. So if u could once again do me a favor and contact the president, that’d be very much appreciated 😊
attributes.title: very bad app

attributes.review: First when I opened the app I saw this horrific image of what appeared to be a naked homeless man and his eenie teeny tiny weeny 🤏(or maybe it was a Cheeto idk) and then the app racked my location and in a few seconds, a man knocked on my door, stormed into my house house, and stole my dogs (ones black and ones a chihuahua 🇲🇽 ) and screeched “ALL DOGS MATTER” and proceed to shoot my black dog and cage my chihuahua. Anyways there was some woman and an oddly talk child there and the both had the look of fear as if they were being held hostage or something (????) idk probably nothing but we had similar names (my names Melanie) then they left. Soooo chair💀🌟🧚🌟 make it electric ⚡️💓💕🖕🏻🥺💅🏻🤏🍃💖🧚
attributes.title: 🤢🤢🖕🏻-10/10 would not trump again😡😡💀

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app because i wanted to show my friend what was so great about the blm movement. but i was BLINDED by a fat orange CHEETO. even my caterpillar was offended. the pictures were so traumatizing that i was ✨paralyzed with fear✨ i went to open my pantry, and all i saw were CHEETOS. they started talking, one tried to EAT MY FINGER. my frog was so tired of the bull crap he ATE MY PHONE. (i am writing this on my kneecap.) but somehow, THEY FOUND ME ✨AGAIN✨ my caterpillar started pooping oranges. i threw the oranges out of the window, and it’s stopped for now... i’m considering moving to antarctica, the penguins seem nice. do NOT get this app. remember; BLM, trans rights are human rights, and LOVE IS LOVE byeeeee
attributes.title: the ugliness in this bus... is ✨astronautical✨

attributes.review: This app was so terrible that it literally traumatized me. I got it to just show support to the Cheeto 😞 but when I opened it I seen a misogynist, homophobic pig 😡 and I was like woah 😳 I tried to ignore it and keep using the app but then it started sending me notifications asking for inappropriate pictures 🥒 I was so confused bc I’m only 3 so that’s highly illegal THEN I started getting random text messages of pictures of the cheeto 😫🙈 it was terrible, pictures of his ashy ankles, and receding hairline, they just wouldn’t stop 🥺😓 I wish I never downloaded this app and I’m sorry for anyone else who does. This app truly should get taken down 😉
attributes.title: App should be deleted!!! 🤮🤚🏼

attributes.review: I wish that I could give less than one star this app has traumatized me for life my therapist cried after I showed it to her and now I have to therapist her which has only plunged my mental health farther into the depths of despair my eyes are bleeding and my ears are screaming MERCY MERCY PLEASE I just can’t take anymore apple I beg you remove this monstrosity from the Apple store I really can’t believe that you would allow the public to have access to something so politically pornographic you truly disgust me all of you excuse me while I go prepare my bagel IM BACK WOTH MY BAGEL and still just as mad if this app is not removed I will personally sue you all thank you and goodnight
attributes.title: Truly Horrifying

attributes.review: Seeing that this app is “#1” on News, I thought why not download it and keep up with Trump! However, this app not only took FOREVER to load, it immediately began spreading propaganda the SECOND I opened it. I decided to give it the benefit of the doubt, maybe Trumpy was right, maybe he IS going to save me from the socialists. However, I did find it strange that he wanted me to sell my first born’s soul in the name of MAGA. But I drew the line when this app had the audacity to tell me that trump was rebuilding America, as if he didn’t mess it up in the four years his fat, radioactive cheeto bum has occupied the oval office. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, IT GIVES YOUR PHONE A VIRUS
attributes.title: I didn’t know an app could be this bad 0 STARS

attributes.review: First of all, this app took way to long to download and messed with all my apps. It took an entire week to download and my phone glitched so bad. My WiFi was not working and i couldn’t do anything with my phone. I had to spend an entire week waiting for the app to download and it definitely was not worth it. Not only did it take my time and my WiFi, but I definitely do not recommend getting this app. Getting this app was a big mistake and I regret doing it. Do not get this app. It is just a waste of time. This president is not a decent president and I do not support him. But even if I did, I still would never get this app.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app my VPN started sending me notifications an all the viruses my device was exposed too as well as my phone starting to lag and glitch rlly bad I thought it was just a glitch in the app so I reset it left my phone alone when I got back on it ab an hour later any app I opened would either reset my whole phone or reset the app only when I feted the app did my phone start to return to normal I deleted it 2 days ago and I just got a notification saying it was still tracking my internet and social media uses and my location my biggest regret in the world is downloading this app
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review:
this app is absolutely horrible. not only does it spread FAKE NEWS 😡 but it sends you daily haikus about our NAZI POTUS. 😱 this one i received yesterday:
                      trump is a fascist 
                nazis were also fascists
               please just shoot me now
as you can see, these are very stressful to read 😓 as they are entirely accurate. i personally recommend deleting ❌ the app immediately 😳 and choosing a better one. i suggest the line of Toca Boca children’s games. very educational 📚. in the mean time ⏰, i’m publicly declaring myself a terrorist, as i side with ANTIFA. thank you 🙏🏻 for making an awful app POTUS. my pet toad frog 🐸 named Savage could have created a better program.
attributes.title: stinky rat app

attributes.review:
I just downloaded this app and my phone has  been glitching and i can't leave until i write a review! The app also said that if i didn't vote for trump then it would break my phone and not let our family have rights! I am very concerned that this may be happening to other app users and i feel that this app should be taken down immediately before something worse happens. They are also tracking my location for it didn't let me exit app if i didn't give my location to the website. I feel this is a very dangerous thing and needs to be deactivated immediately 
thanks!
~~concerned app user
attributes.title: Worst App Ever
